ygData.subject: Scars
ygData.msgSnippet: Alright, it took a lot of effort but finally got a copy of Scars of Velious. Now I m only a level 7 monk and have no chance of going there any time soon
ygData.messageBody:
Alright, it took a lot of effort but finally got
a copy of Scars of Velious. Now I'm only a level 7
monk and have no chance of going there any time soon
BUT...<br><br>I love the new customize options. Now all I have to
do is redo my colors again. Trying to find a color
for text that works in Full Screen and the small
screen modes. Being able to get to inventory in Full
Screen ROCKS. <br><br>Anyone else's opinions? To me the
customization options in and of themselves pay for the
expansion. But that's just me. Wish they did something
similar for the Spellcaster's mem. But I'm sure they
didn't so the spell casters would still be unable to see
when memming new spells or what not.<br><br>shooman,
Monk of 7 on Drinal
